long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browser into the streets of Initial D with the Raining Live Wallpaper extension! Every new tab immerses you in the adrenaline-fueled world of drifting, featuring high-quality animations of iconic rain-soaked racing scenes from the legendary anime.

Key Features:
Dynamic Raining Live Wallpapers: Relive epic drifting moments with animated backgrounds of rain-drenched mountain passes.
Clock & Date Display: Stay on schedule with a sleek clock and date layout that complements the racing atmosphere.
Quick Access Links: Navigate your favorite websites effortlessly with one-click shortcuts.
Extra Options: Discover more extensions, check the privacy policy, or uninstall easily whenever you like.
Perfect for fans of Initial D and car enthusiasts, this extension combines style and functionality, bringing the rush of the race to your browser.

Download now and drift into every new tab with the excitement of Initial D!
